location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 147 of 1855 from Henry Lacon Anderson, Secretary to the Government, Secret Department, Bombay to Captain Arnold Burrowes Kemball, Resident in the Persian Gulf, at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter is acknowledging the receipt of a communication (No. 5) from the Resident dated 25 April 1855 concerning Shaikh Mahomed bin Kulleefa's [Muḥammed bin Khalīfah Āl Khalīfah] acquiescence to the Resident's views on the subject of the maintenance to be assigned to Shaikh Mahomed bin Abdoolla; it states that the Bombay Government has sanctioned the Resident's proceedings in relation to the matter.
